name: Chat'n Judge
description:
A short story game where you must ask question on a chat room system to uncover a major crime. Is the suspect telling the TRUTH or he DAREd to tell a lie! oohhh!!!

HOW TO PLAY 

You must select words to make a question. Some answer might add words to your vocabulary. This game is Touch Screen compatible. You can fastforward the text to your next question with [SPACE].
